item.title: Updates
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Well, one and half month passed and I never post even a single word … yes I was busy but main reason is … I was lazy. Alright, some updates – I successfully migrate the bcookie module from Apache HTTPd to nginx, things were really tough at the very beginning whenever all you understand is [...]
item.content:encoded:
Well, one and half month passed and I never post even a single word … yes I was busy but main reason is … I was lazy.

Alright, some updates – I successfully migrate the bcookie module from Apache HTTPd to nginx, things were really tough at the very beginning whenever all you understand is Apache. However, at this stage I would like to say nginx is kind of neat and elegant, expanding it is not that hard though you have to build everythingÂ  in one shot (i.e. no dso allowed), I’d like to dig in why they have design like this as this is really uncommon in modern era.

And I’m moving to .Net now, again I have no idea so far, but I believe I need to write a filter in C# (YAY!), but before that I need get IIS up and running, and determine if there is any compatibility issues between different version of IIS (and .Net Framework).

Stay tuned, I will post whenever I make any progress and most likely that will be the time I move to Java container part – Jetty or Tomcat, not sure so far.
